name: World Rally Fever: Born on the Road
name_original: World Rally Fever: Born on the Road
description:
World Rally Fever is exactly what the title says it is: a fast paced, crazy action racing game that features circuits themed to evoke different famous places around the world, rendered in stylish anime-style graphics and paired with a sleek soundtrack. There are eight characters to choose from, each with unique characteristics that affect the handling of their vehicle. Fair play is something you have to forget and put to one side, because once that race starts there are no rules but one: win. You are not defenseless in this tough competition. There are weapons and power-ups you can use to do more than simply eke out a win: they allow you to win in style, with as many explosive collisions as possible.

World Rally Fever won the hearts of many gamers for its unique gameplay and distinctive visuals. Once you start playing you may find it feels like you were born to ride the road--and find it hard to stop! Controls are responsive, the music is catchy, and the general immersion factor is huge. So if you were looking for a crazy racing game with a twist, then World Rally Fever is for you!Fun arcade racing game with cartoon-style graphics and fast-paced action. Vast variety of circuits across the world; large selection of characters and upgrades. Stylish soundtrack that covers various music genres including pop, jazz, metal, and rock - something for everyone.
